alert.note: Alert for Bladen (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 5:40PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Bladen County through 615 PM EDT... At 540 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lagoon, or 8 miles east of Elizabethtown, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elizabethtown, Lagoon, White Lake and Bladen County Hospital. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
